Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Mountain View Coporate Center is a 4 building office complex totaling
461,083 square feet. There are multiple fiber optic providers and seven watts of power for tenant use. It has extraordinary mountain views and is located off the Boulder Turnpike and Hwy 287. It is adjacent to and RTD Park-and-Ride, Jefferson County Airport, Flatiron Crossing Mall, Omni Hotel, Sun Microsystems, Level 3, Corporate Express, McData and Cirrus Logic and is ten minutes from the University of Colorado at Boulder.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Mountain View Coporate Center is a 4 building office complex totaling 461,083 square feet. There are multiple fiber optic providers and seven watts of power for tenant use. It has extraordinary mountain views and is located off the Boulder Turnpike and Hwy 287. It is adjacent to and RTD Park-and-Ride, Jefferson County Airport, Flatiron Crossing Mall, Omni Hotel, Sun Microsystems, Level 3, Corporate Express, McData and Cirrus Logic and is ten minutes from the University of Colorado at Boulder.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Full Floor.  Contiguous with Suite 200 for 30,696 SF
Contiguous with Suite 1000 via an interconnecting stairwell for 37,271 SF
Contiguous with Suite 900 via an interconnecting stairwell for 37,271 SF

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Interlocken Crescent features Cherrywood and granite finishes, state-of-the-art HVAC system and fiber optics capability. There are two-color limestone floors with polished granite accents and tinted green glass window panels, cove ceilings, custom pattern-loop carpets, dramatic down lighting and cove lighting. It has Rocky Mountain views and 24/7 building access. Located next to the new Flatiron crossing mall, near numerous restaurants, retail, banking, park and business services, it is located on the RTD route.

Ideally located in the highly-desirable Interlocken Advanced Technology Environment along U.S. 36, the main thoroughfare linking Denver and Boulder 

As the tallest office structure in Interlocken, along with its sister building 380 Interlocken, the project offers panoramic views of the Rocky Mountains and is within walking distance to the Interlocken recreation area which provides jogging trails, volleyball courts, softball fields/soccer fields, tennis courts and open fields 

The site is contiguous to a 2.9 acre lake surrounded by a 3.7 acre park. A network of planned sidewalks allows users a direct connection to these landscape amenities 

Close proximity to the 392 room Omni Interlocken Hotel/Conference Resort and 27-hole championship golf course 

Parking ratio of 4.2:1000

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Office intensive space with large open area and private restrooms.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This single-story office building is conveniently accessible to Highway 36, within 5 minutes of Boulder and 20 minutes of Denver. It offers an office park setting with a 27-hole championship golf course. Interlocken Park offers ball fields, tennis courts, jogging trails, ponds and open, landscaped areas. The business park infrastructure can accommodate fiber-optic capabilities with voice, data and video transmission applications.
